title: Want List: Must Be PSA Graded

posts.post_title: Want List: Must Be PSA Graded
posts.post_content:
PSA 1 - 4

Bill Burns
Jean Dubuc
Chick Gandil
Ed Cicotte
Hal Chase (white cap, trophy)

PSA 1 - 3 

HOFers with backs other than Piedmont, Old Mill, Sweet Cap, Polar Bear

Please e-mail via net54 or directly to [url]jeffmbarlow@gmail.com[/url].

Hi Jeff,

I've got a couple of duplicate Cicottes that I could sell.  PSA 3 for $115 (the price sticker on the back was there when I bought it...) and PSA 2 for $75.

[IMG]https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-m4Chf71mC9k/Tkiem354kGI/AAAAAAAAMwY/ZNIXzqaR2e8/s640/T206%252520Cicotte%252520%2525282%252529%252520-%252520front.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-EL1hdVYpCgI/TkienIX-S8I/AAAAAAAAMwg/NTAG9nxbgeI/s640/T206%252520Cicotte%252520%2525282%252529%252520-%252520rear.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-gI6Lp2vctqU/Tkienho2NUI/AAAAAAAAMwo/s51RHUZ4WGM/s640/T206%252520Cicotte%252520%2525283%252529%252520-%252520front.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-fxSQ3BYEKNM/Tkien7aXnoI/AAAAAAAAMww/sc8O3ZRASrA/s640/T206%252520Cicotte%252520%2525283%252529%252520-%252520rear.jpg[/IMG]

Also, if you're willing to consider SGC, I've got a Chase blue portrait in SGC 50, polar bear back, that I could sell for $115.

[IMG]https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-UHJ873Pmxo4/Tkiej8adKLI/AAAAAAAAMus/LZXAFd3nVFw/s640/T206%252520Chase%252520%252528portrait%25252C%252520blue%252529%252520-%252520front.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-Gve139oG0lU/TkiekG2MMXI/AAAAAAAAMu4/zJtWQWF3q2Y/s640/T206%252520Chase%252520%252528portrait%25252C%252520blue%252529%252520-%252520rear.jpg[/IMG]

Hope this helps,
--S
